item.title: My First Post
item.description: Use Markdown to write This text was written in MWeb. I use HUGO frame and Github to build this website system. This is static website system, you write in the local and then release to the internet. HUGO The world’s fastest framework for building websites. https://gohugo.io/ GitHub Learn Git and GitHub without any code! https://github.com/ MWeb Pro Markdown writing, note taking and static blog generator App. https://www.mweb.im/
